title: Sister of 'Jihadi Sid' developed obsession with journalist who produced documentary
text:
The sister of 'Jihadi Sid' developed an obsession with a journalist who produced a documentary about her brother, a court has heard.

Konika Dhar, 32, developed a crush on Sunday Times Security Correspondent Richard Kerbaj, harassing him and his ex-girlfriend, a court heard today.

Ms Dhar, from Enfield, is the sister of Siddartha Dhar, 35, who changed his name to Abu Rumaysah and fled the UK with his wife and four children to join ISIS.

The 32-year-old's brother featured in the documentary 'My Son the Jihadi', which was produced by Mr Kerbaj, who then recieved unsolicited messages from Ms Dhar.

Ms Dhar pleaded guilty to harassment of Mr Kerbaj with online threats between January 1, 2016 and April 4 of this year and to the harassment of his ex-girlfriend Times reporter Katie Gibbons, between August 1, 2016 and April 4, also with online threats.
